code: WITH respiratory AS (   SELECT     pid,     COALESCE(pao2 / fio2, 500) AS pfr,     COALESCE(IIF(spo2 <= 97, spo2 / fio2, 500), 500) AS sfr,     COALESCE(vent, 0)          AS imv,     IIF(fio2 > 0.21 OR vent = 1, 1, 0) AS other_respiratory_support   FROM sepsis ) SELECT *,   imv * (IIF(pfr < 100 OR sfr < 148, 1, 0) + IIF(pfr < 200 OR sfr < 220, 1, 0) ) +     other_respiratory_support * IIF(pfr < 400 OR sfr < 292, 1, 0) AS phoenix_respiratory_score   FROM respiratory; dbWriteTable(conn = con, name = "respiratory", value = resp)
